entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Calling ReplaceNode/ReplaceNodes on the Type specifier of a DeclarationPatternSyntax results in losing a space #61371
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorsafterclosingfile is flaky #61368
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorlist #61367
  • CSharpWrappingCodeRefactorProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #61362
    Backlog
  • Roslyn fails to take into account lifted operators' behavior resulting in false postivie nulalbility warnings #61361
  • Referencing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle in .NET Framework project needs Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Compilers which causes dependency to netstandard.dll #61360
  • Renaming moves focus to a different editor, doesn't rename #61357
    17.3
  • Braces need escaping in raw string interpolation on net472 #61355

Closed

  • Json classification appears to be broken with 'LSP classification' on. #61212
    17.3
  • Integration test failure: CSharpEncapsulateField #61128
  • error IDE0055 - seems inconsistent running in Devops #61042
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Allow services to be exported per language server #61002
  • Formatter requires two passes for comments in lambdas #60437
    Next
  • Source generator Is not found/executed #61365

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE
  • Use the correct span to rename after invoking extract-method manually. #61369
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] [Do not review] Try various changes to fix CI for #61351 #61363
    Area-IDE, Community
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • [LSP] Add JSON semantic token classifications #61231
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move Spellcheck capabilities to be activated in all scenarios #61366
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • [LSP] Support LSP services associated with LSP server instances (with lifetimes that match). #61266
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Avoid caching indentation data that changes over time #61304
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Removed unintentional `WorkItem`s #61349
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61359
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61358
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61354
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61353
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • Better completions in generic constraints #61335
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add the fix all provider for fixing all naming violation to feature branch #59726
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce allocations in DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader.ReadToEnd #61351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE
  • Improve SyntaxNormalizer performance #50778
    Area-Compilers
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • WIP: Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
